response.description: The response is the answer to a math problem, which is generated by the AI model.

type.description: The type refers to the category of the math problem.

value_dict.MATH_Rephrased: The problem is a rephrased math problem.
value_dict.GSM_AnsAug: The problem is an answer-augmented problem in the General Science category.
value_dict.MATH_SV: The problem is a single variable math problem.

value_dict.GSM_FOBAR: The problem is a follow-on problem in the General Science category.

query.description: The query is the math problem that needs to be solved.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing educational data.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the query, please classify the type of the problem.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is it a rephrased math problem[0], an answer-augmented problem in the General Science category[1], a single variable math problem[2], a rephrased problem in the General Science category[3], an answer-augmented math problem[4], a single variable problem in the General Science category[5], a follow-on problem in the Math category[6], or a follow-on problem in the General Science category[7]?
